sentences.en: An indescribable uneasiness pervaded all minds.
sentences.cn: 盘踞在大家心中的是一种无法描写的不安.

sentences.en: But then she thought of the indescribable happiness she had known with him.
sentences.cn: 继而一想,跟着祥子的快活,又不是言语所能形容的.

sentences.en: He felt an indescribable sensation somewhat akin to dread.
sentences.cn: 他感到一种形容不出的感觉,有点近于恐怖.

sentences.en: He recognised the indescribable thing that made up for fascination and beauty in her.
sentences.cn: 他在她身上看到了那些构成美丽和魅力的难以描绘的气质.

sentences.en: However, many others articulate this land that seems indescribable.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此, 许多人说这块土地似乎无法描述.

sentences.en: It was with indescribable relief that I received the news that President Roosevelt had been re - elected.
sentences.cn: 当我得到罗斯福总统再度当选的消息后,我的欣慰之情真是难以形容.

sentences.en: Its indescribable majesty and its indescribable charm remained.
sentences.cn: 那描不尽的端庄,说不尽的风韵,依旧不减当年.

sentences.en: The freshness of her beauty was indeed gone, its indescribable majesty and its indescribable charm remained.
sentences.cn: 她那明艳的秀色固然已经一去不返, 可是那描写不尽的端庄,说不尽的风韵,仍旧不减当年.

sentences.en: The major looked at the count with an indescribable expression of anxiety.
sentences.cn: 少校带着一种无法形容的焦急的神色望伯爵.

sentences.en: The scene was one of indescribable beauty.
sentences.cn: 那真是无法描绘的绮丽风光.

sentences.en: The stench from the sewer is indescribable.
sentences.cn: 下水道发出一股说不出的恶臭。

sentences.en: There was an indescribable flickering glow in his eyes, creating a fearsome and wholly unnatural effect.
sentences.cn: 他的眼里射出一种无法形容的闪烁的光辉, 给人以一种可怕的、完全不正常的感觉.

sentences.en: Why are oneself always met is indescribable mood bad?
sentences.cn: 为什么自己总是会莫名其妙的心情不好 呢 ?

sentences.en: Xiangzi sat still, his heart suddenly filled with indescribable warmth.
sentences.cn: 祥子没动, 心中忽然感觉到一点说不出来的亲热.

trans.tran_cn: 不明确的，模糊的，难以描述的，描写不出的
trans.tran_en: something that is indescribable is so terrible, so good, so strange etc that you cannot describe it, or it is too difficult to describe
